verbs.description: A major South Korean newspaper [V: has] slammed Trump for giving away the farm to North Korea .
[ARG0: A major South Korean newspaper] has [V: slammed] [ARG1: Trump] [ARG2: for giving away the farm to North Korea] .
A major South Korean newspaper has slammed [ARG0: Trump] for [V: giving] away [ARG1: the farm] [ARG2: to North Korea] .
